name: Promo Direct
tag_list: promotional-products, corporate-gifts, business-gifts, promotional-items, promotional-pens, promo-items
overview:
Promo Direct is one of the nation’s leading promotional products suppliers, with thousands of satisfied customers and tremendous buying power. We keep our overhead low and buy at high volume for deep discounts on hundreds of top quality, brand name promotional products.

Promo Direct is committed to saving you money. Every product in our catalog is a proven winner and available at the lowest prices anywhere! But Promo Direct offers far more than great prices.

Our #1 goal is your complete satisfaction. We are committed to serving and satisfying your needs better than anyone.

You save time. Simply find the product you want, add it to your cart and you will be ordering products in minutes! We will send you confirmation via email and customer service is always an email or phone call away. Or, if you prefer, call 1-800-748-6150 M-F, 6:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. PST and place your order right over the phone.

You’re well-served. Whether you order via the web, phone, fax or mail, you will be assisted by Promo Direct professionals.

Large buying power equals lower prices for you. With Promo Direct’s tremendous buying power, we can bring you the best prices on everything from a low-end giveaway item to a high-end business gift. In fact, every price on every product we sell is backed by Promo Direct’s 100% Low Price Guarantee!

If you find an identical item advertised locally for less, now or within 30 days of your purchase, let us know. We’ll be glad to beat the lower price.

You can count on Promo Direct for:

Low prices, backed by our 100% low-price guarantee

FREE faxed proof of your imprint, ensuring that your order is produced just the way you want it

Easy ordering and convenience, matched with our 100% satisfaction guarantee

Knowledgeable and friendly customer service representatives

Shop from Promo Direct and save. Order products online or call 1-800-748-6150 to place your order today! We look forward to serving you.
